description:
go.tools/go/types: don't use nil fields and methods

The change for fields is in anticipation of fields
becoming a *Scope.

Pointed out by adonovan.

messages.text:
Hello adonovan (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go.tools

> 
> I'd like you to review this change to
> https://code.google.com/p/go.tools

LGTM

thanks

*** Submitted as https://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=1888d8a2b06f&repo=tools ***

go.tools/go/types: don't use nil fields and methods

The change for fields is in anticipation of fields
becoming a *Scope.

Pointed out by adonovan.
